General.Name: Taiwan Thick-Film Ind
General.Description: Taiwan Thick-Film Ind. Corp manufactures and sells transformers, backlight modules, light emitting diode (LED) light bars, and light guide plates in Taiwan. The company offers back light modules, such as in-vehicle and industrial control, tablet series, NB series, and monitors; LCM assemblies; LED light bars for consumer electronics, industrial control, medical, military, automotive, and other applications; and automotive/new energy automotive electronics, which includes vehicle charging station and vehicle charging indicator main boards, car door lock main boards, automotive control switches, anti-pinch window lift monitor main boards, and vehicle indicator light switches. It also provides cultural and creative business unit that provides brand licensing, product image design, cross-industry alliances and strategic alliances, creative products, 3C-related products, daily necessities, and auto supplies, as well as reinforced plastic corrugated sheets. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 7, Siyuan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 242
